title: Google Warns Salesloft OAuth Breach Extends Beyond Salesforce, Impacting All Integrations
description: Google has revealed that the recent wave of attacks targeting Salesforce instances via Salesloft Drift is much broader in scope than previously thought, stating it impacts all integrations.
